Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
baby-sit \baby-sit\ v. act as a baby-sitter
Syn: babysit, sit [WordNet 1.5]
baby-sit v : work or act as a baby-sitter; "I cannot baby-sit tonight; I have too much homework to do" [syn: {sit}] [also: {baby-sitting}, {baby-sat}]
